original_title: The History Of Iron Maiden - Part 2: Live After Death
overview: Continuation of "The History Of Iron Maiden" documentary series, which began with The History of Iron Maiden â€“ Part 1: The Early Days. Band members, crew, friends and associates talk about the period in the band's career which saw the writing, recording and release of the Powerslave album, the following World Slavery Tour and the recording of the Live After Death album.
title: The History Of Iron Maiden - Part 2: Live After Death
